groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem
groups.description: Configuration for a PEM-based credential.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks
groups.description: Configuration for a JKS (Java KeyStore) based credential.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store
groups.description: Configuration for the KeyStore holding the key pair entry.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.key
groups.description: Configuration for the key pair entry of the store.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11
groups.description: If the type is "PKCS11" and a provider that is not statically configured for PKCS#11, additional PKCS#11 configuration needs to be supplied. Note that the security provider used must support PKCS#11 via the KeyStoreSpi interface. The "SunPKCS11" is such a provider.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings
groups.description: Custom PKCS#11 settings.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.encrypt.pem

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.encrypt.jks.key
groups.description: Configuration for the key pair entry of the store.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.encrypt.jks.store.pkcs11
groups.description: If the type is "PKCS11" and a provider that is not statically configured for PKCS#11, additional PKCS#11 configuration needs to be supplied. Note that the security provider used must support PKCS#11 via the KeyStoreSpi interface. The "SunPKCS11" is such a provider.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.encrypt.jks.store.pkcs11.settings
groups.description: Custom PKCS#11 settings.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.default-crededential.jks.store.pkcs11.settings
groups.description: Custom PKCS#11 settings.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.jks.store.pkcs11.settings
groups.description: Custom PKCS#11 settings.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem
groups.description: Configuration for a PEM-based credential.

groups.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.bundle
properties.description: Pointer to a pre-registered credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.key-id
properties.description: Key identifier metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.issued-at
properties.description: Issued-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.expires-at
properties.description: Expires-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.metadata
properties.description: Metadata properties.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store-reference
properties.description: A store reference. As an alternative to giving the key store configuration, a reference to a key store configuration may be given. This feature may be used when one key store holds several keys.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.location
properties.description: Location of the resource containing the store content.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.password
properties.description: Password used to access the store.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.type
properties.description: Type of the store to create, e.g., JKS, PKCS12 or PKCS11.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.provider
properties.description: Security provider for the store.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11.configuration-file
properties.description: The complete path of the PKCS#11 configuration file with which the PKCS#11 device is configured.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.library
properties.description: The PKCS#11 library path.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.name
properties.description: The name of the PKCS#11 slot.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.slot
properties.description: The slot number/id to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.slot-list-index
properties.description: The slot index to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.monitor
properties.description: Whether the credential should be prepared for monitoring. If set, a test function and a KeyStoreReloader will be assigned.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.key.alias
properties.description: The alias that identifies the key pair in the key store.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.key.certificates
properties.description: For some credentials where an underlying KeyStore is being used, an external certificate should be used. The most typical example would be a PKCS#11 key store where the certificate of the key pair resides outside the HSM device. This setting holds the location or content of the certificate or certificate chain in PEM format.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.jks.key.key-password
properties.description:
The password to unlock the key entry identified by the given alias. If not given, the store password will be used
     * (in these cases, using a store reference will not function).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.public-key
properties.description: Location or content of the public key in PEM format. This setting is mutually exclusive with the certificates setting.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.certificates
properties.description: Location or content of the certificate or certificate chain in PEM format. If more than one certificate is supplied, the entity certificate, i.e., the certificate holding the public key of the key pair, must be placed first. This setting is mutually exclusive with the public-key setting.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.private-key
properties.description: Location or content of the private key in PEM format.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.key-password
properties.description: Password used to decrypt an encrypted private key.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.key-id
properties.description: Key identifier metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.issued-at
properties.description: Issued-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.expires-at
properties.description: Expires-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pem.metadata
properties.description: Metadata properties.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.alias
properties.description: The keystore alias to the entry holding the key pair.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.certificate
properties.description: A resource holding the certificate part of the credential (optional since the certificate may be part of a keystore).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.certificates
properties.description: A list of resources holding the certificate chain that part of the credential (optional since the certificate may be part of a keystore). If used, the entity certificate must be the first element.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.key-password
properties.description: The password to unlock the private key from the keystore or the encrypted private key.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.password
properties.description: The keystore password.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pin
properties.description: The PIN (which is the same as key-password). Used mainly for PKCS#11.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.pkcs11-configuration
properties.description: The PKCS#11 configuration file to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.private-key
properties.description: A resource holding the private key part of the credential (optional since the key may be part of a keystore).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.provider
properties.description: The name of the security provider to use when creating the KeyStore instance.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.resource
properties.description: A resource to the keystore containing the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.sign.type
properties.description: The type of keystore.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.certificates
properties.description: Location or content of the certificate or certificate chain in PEM format. If more than one certificate is supplied, the entity certificate, i.e., the certificate holding the public key of the key pair, must be placed first. This setting is mutually exclusive with the public-key setting.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.private-key
properties.description: Location or content of the private key in PEM format.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.key-password
properties.description: Password used to decrypt an encrypted private key.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.key-id
properties.description: Key identifier metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.issued-at
properties.description: Issued-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.expires-at
properties.description: Expires-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pem.metadata
properties.description: Metadata properties.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.alias
properties.description: The keystore alias to the entry holding the key pair.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.certificate
properties.description: A resource holding the certificate part of the credential (optional since the certificate may be part of a keystore).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.certificates
properties.description: A list of resources holding the certificate chain that part of the credential (optional since the certificate may be part of a keystore). If used, the entity certificate must be the first element.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.key-password
properties.description: The password to unlock the private key from the keystore or the encrypted private key.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.password
properties.description: The keystore password.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pin
properties.description: The PIN (which is the same as key-password). Used mainly for PKCS#11.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.pkcs11-configuration
properties.description: The PKCS#11 configuration file to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.private-key
properties.description: A resource holding the private key part of the credential (optional since the key may be part of a keystore).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.provider
properties.description: The name of the security provider to use when creating the KeyStore instance.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.resource
properties.description: A resource to the keystore containing the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.previous-encrypt.type
properties.description: The type of keystore.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.bundle
properties.description: Pointer to a pre-registered credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.key-id
properties.description: Key identifier metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.issued-at
properties.description: Issued-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.expires-at
properties.description: Expires-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.metadata
properties.description: Metadata properties.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store-reference
properties.description: A store reference. As an alternative to giving the key store configuration, a reference to a key store configuration may be given. This feature may be used when one key store holds several keys.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.location
properties.description: Location of the resource containing the store content.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.password
properties.description: Password used to access the store.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.type
properties.description: Type of the store to create, e.g., JKS, PKCS12 or PKCS11.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.provider
properties.description: Security provider for the store.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.pkcs11.configuration-file
properties.description: The complete path of the PKCS#11 configuration file with which the PKCS#11 device is configured.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.library
properties.description: The PKCS#11 library path.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.name
properties.description: The name of the PKCS#11 slot.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.slot
properties.description: The slot number/id to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.store.pkcs11.settings.slot-list-index
properties.description: The slot index to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.monitor
properties.description: Whether the credential should be prepared for monitoring. If set, a test function and a KeyStoreReloader will be assigned.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.key.alias
properties.description: The alias that identifies the key pair in the key store.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.key.certificates
properties.description: For some credentials where an underlying KeyStore is being used, an external certificate should be used. The most typical example would be a PKCS#11 key store where the certificate of the key pair resides outside the HSM device. This setting holds the location or content of the certificate or certificate chain in PEM format.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.jks.key.key-password
properties.description:
The password to unlock the key entry identified by the given alias. If not given, the store password will be used
     * (in these cases, using a store reference will not function).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.public-key
properties.description: Location or content of the public key in PEM format. This setting is mutually exclusive with the certificates setting.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.certificates
properties.description: Location or content of the certificate or certificate chain in PEM format. If more than one certificate is supplied, the entity certificate, i.e., the certificate holding the public key of the key pair, must be placed first. This setting is mutually exclusive with the public-key setting.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.private-key
properties.description: Location or content of the private key in PEM format.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.key-password
properties.description: Password used to decrypt an encrypted private key.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.key-id
properties.description: Key identifier metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.issued-at
properties.description: Issued-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.expires-at
properties.description: Expires-at metadata property.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pem.metadata
properties.description: Metadata properties.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.name
properties.description: The name of the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.alias
properties.description: The keystore alias to the entry holding the key pair.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.certificate
properties.description: A resource holding the certificate part of the credential (optional since the certificate may be part of a keystore).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.certificates
properties.description: A list of resources holding the certificate chain that part of the credential (optional since the certificate may be part of a keystore). If used, the entity certificate must be the first element.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.key-password
properties.description: The password to unlock the private key from the keystore or the encrypted private key.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.password
properties.description: The keystore password.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pin
properties.description: The PIN (which is the same as key-password). Used mainly for PKCS#11.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.pkcs11-configuration
properties.description: The PKCS#11 configuration file to use.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.private-key
properties.description: A resource holding the private key part of the credential (optional since the key may be part of a keystore).

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.provider
properties.description: The name of the security provider to use when creating the KeyStore instance.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.resource
properties.description: A resource to the keystore containing the credential.

properties.name: saml.idp.credentials.metadata-sign.type
properties.description: The type of keystore.
